settings.upsell-title: How to Purchase a Solar Kit or Components With a Payment Plan
settings.box-body-upsell-1:
Add items to your cart, choose PayTomorrow or Affirm at checkout, and get a real-time decision without affecting
your credit score.
settings.box-body-upsell-2: PayTomorrow and Affirm instantly evaluates your specific credit profile and customizes an offer just for you.
settings.box-body-upsell-3: Get your solar kit or components today and make payments over time
settings.box-body-upsell-4: Install your solar kit with our assistance and enjoy the benefits of going solar!
settings.compare-title: Flexible Ways to Buy Now & Pay Later
